tit.j: 京都市西京極総合運動公園陸上競技場兼球技場

sen.j: 京都市西京極総合運動公園陸上競技場兼球技場（きょうとし にしきょうごくそうごううんどうこうえん りくじょうきょうぎじょう けん きゅうぎじょう）は、京都府京都市右京区の京都市西京極総合運動公園内にある陸上競技場。
sen.e: Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium refers to the athletic field in Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park in Ukyo ward, Kyoto city, Kyoto prefecture.
Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium refers to the athletic field in Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park in Ukyo ward, Kyoto city, Kyoto prefecture.
Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium refers to the athletic field in Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park in Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 球技場としても使用される。
sen.e: It is also used as a ball game ground.
It is also used as a ball game field.
It is also used as a ball game field.

sen.j: 日本プロサッカーリーグ・京都サンガF.C.がホームスタジアムとして使用している。
sen.e: Japan Professional Football League Kyoto Sanga F.C. uses it as the home stadium.
Japan Professional Football League Kyoto Sanga F.C. uses it as their home stadium.
Japan Professional Football League Kyoto Sanga F.C. uses it as their home stadium.

sen.j: 一般的には西京極競技場、または西京極という通称で呼ばれる。
sen.e: Generally, it is commonly called Nishikyogoku kyogijo (athletic field) or Nishikyogoku.
Generally, it is commonly called Nishikyogoku kyogijo (athletic field) or Nishikyogoku.
Generally, it is commonly called Nishikyogoku kyogijo (athletic field) or Nishikyogoku.

sen.j: 施設は京都市が所有し、京都市体育協会が指定管理者として運営管理を行っている。
sen.e: Kyoto city owns the facility and Kyoto City Amateur Sports Association manages it as a designated manager.
Kyoto city owns the facility and Kyoto City Amateur Sports Association manages it as the designated manager.
Kyoto City owns the facility and Kyoto City Amateur Sports Association manages it as the designated manager.
sen.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 1930年、東宮（昭和天皇）御成婚奉祝記念に建設された。
sen.e: In 1930 it was built as a memorial to the marriage of Togu (Emperor Showa).
In 1930 it was built as a memorial upon the marriage of Togu (Emperor Showa).
In 1930 it was built as a memorial upon the marriage of Togu (Emperor Showa).

sen.j: 1988年の2巡目国体の第1回会場として使用されるのを機にナイター照明設備、電光掲示板を設置。
sen.e: When it was used for the first National Sports Festival's second round in 1988, the lighting facilities for night games and the electrical scoreboard were installed.
When it was used for the first National Sports Festival's second round in 1988, the lighting facilities for night games and the electrical scoreboard were installed.
When it was used for the first National Sports Festival's second round in 1988, the lighting facilities for night games and the electrical scoreboard were installed.

sen.j: メインスタンドも改修された。
sen.e: The main stand was also repaired.
The main stand was also repaired.
The main stand was also repaired.

sen.j: 1995年には京都パープルサンガ（当時）のJリーグ昇格に合わせ、バック・サイドスタンドの座席化と電光掲示板の大型化を行った。
sen.e: In 1995 when Kyoto Purple Sanga F.C. (in those days) was promoted to J League (Japan Professional Football League), the seats were installed in the backside stand and the electrical scoreboard was made larger.

In 1995 when Kyoto Purple Sanga F.C. (in those days) was promoted to J League (Japan Professional Football League), the seats were installed on the backside stand and the electrical scoreboard was made larger.

In 1995 when Kyoto Purple Sanga F.C. (in those days) was promoted to J League (Japan Professional Football League), the seats were installed on the backside stand and the electrical scoreboard was made larger.

sen.j: 日本陸上競技連盟第一種公認
sen.e: Approved as the first kind by Japan Association of Athletics Federations.
Approved as the first kind by the Japan Association of Athletics Federation.
Approved as the first kind by the Japan Association of Athletics Federation.

sen.j: トラック：400 m x 9レーン
sen.e: Track : 400 meters X 9 lanes
Track: 400 meters X 9 lanes
Track: 9 lanes of 400 meters

sen.j: 収容人員：20,588人
sen.e: The capacity : 20,588 people
Capacity: 20,588 people
Capacity: 20,588 people

sen.j: 照明設備：メインスタンド庇先投光器、照明塔5基
sen.e: The lighting facilities : the projector at edge of the eaves of main stand, 5 illumination towers.
Lighting facilities: projector mounted at edge of the eaves of main stand, 5 illumination towers.
Lighting facilities: Projector mounted at edge of the eaves of main stand, 5 illumination towers.

sen.j: 電光掲示板（南側サイドスタンド） ボードは左側が球技用の得点掲示板。
sen.e: The electrical scoreboard (the south side stand) : the left of the board is for the score board for ball games.
Electrical scoreboard (the south side stand): the left side of the board is the score board for ball games.
Electrical scoreboard (the south side stand): The left side of the board is the score board for ball games.

sen.j: 右側はフリーボードで陸上競技の各種記録やサッカー・ラグビーでは出場選手の表示などに利用されている。
sen.e: The right of the board is the free board which is used for various records of athletic sports or the indication for the competitors in soccer or rugby.
The right side of the board is the free board which is used for scores of athletic sports or for indicating competitors in soccer or rugby.
The right side of the board is the free board which is used for scores of athletic sports or for indicating competitors in soccer or rugby.

sen.e: Soccer, International A match : (August 6, 1995)

tit.j: Jリーグ京都サンガF.C.戦を観戦時の注意事項
tit.e: The notes when watching the games of J League Kyoto Sanga F.C.
Notes on the games of J League Kyoto Sanga F.C.
Notes on the games of J League Kyoto Sanga F.C.

sen.j: 通常Jリーグの試合ではメインスタンドから向かって左側のサイドスタンドがホーム側、右側はアウェー側となっている（実際1996年度まではこの通りだった）が、このスタジアムの北（左）側サイドスタンドは、2巡目国体の第1回の際に聖火台として使用されたモニュメントや3000m障害競技に使われる水濠があるため充分な観戦スペースがない。
sen.e: Usually in the games of J League, centering on the main stand, the stand of left side is for the home side and the right side is for the away side (in fact, as it was until 1996), but in the case of the north (left) side-stand of this stadium, there are the monument which was used as the platform (structure) bearing the Olympic flame in the first National Sports Festival's second round and the water jump used for the 3000 meters steeplechase race and thus there is not enough space for watching games.

Usually in the games of the J League, centering on the main stand, the stand of left side is for the home side and the right side is for the visiting side (in fact, as it was until 1996), but in the case of the north (left) side-stand of this stadium, there is a monument used as the platform (structure) bearing the Olympic flame in the first National Sports Festival's second round and the water jump used for the 3000 meters steeplechase race and thus there is not enough space there for watching games.

Usually in the games of the J League, centering on the main stand, the stand of left side is for the home side and the right side is for the visiting side (in fact, as it was until 1996), but in the case of the north (left) side-stand of this stadium, there is a monument used as the platform (structure) bearing the Olympic flame in the first National Sports Festival's second round and the water jump used for the 3000 meters steeplechase race and thus there is not enough space there for watching games.

sen.j: そこでホームチーム（京都サンガF.C.）のゴール裏サポーター席は南（右）側サイドスタンド（電光掲示板のある側）を利用している。
sen.e: Thus, the supporters of the home team (Kyoto Sanga F.C.) behind the goal posts uses the seats in the south (right) side stand (the side of the electrical scoreboard).
Thus, supporters of the home team (Kyoto Sanga F.C.) behind the goal posts uses the seats on the south (right) side stand (the side of the electrical scoreboard).
Thus, supporters of the home team (Kyoto Sanga F.C.) behind the goal posts uses the seats on the south (right) side stand (the side of the electrical scoreboard).

tit.j: アテネ五輪女子マラソン金メダリスト野口みずき
tit.e: Mizuki NOGUCHI, the gold medalist in the women's marathon at the Athens Olympics.
Mizuki NOGUCHI, the gold medalist in the women's marathon at the Athens Olympics.
Mizuki NOGUCHI, the gold medalist in the women's marathon at the Athens Olympics
tit.cmt: ピリオドを削除しました。

sen.j: 野口みずき選手が所属するシスメックス陸上競技部はこの競技場の近くにある。
sen.e: Sysmex Women's Track & Field Team to which Mizuki NOGUCHI belongs is near the stadium.
Sysmex Women's Track & Field Team to which Mizuki NOGUCHI belongs is near the stadium.
Sysmex Women's Track and Field Team to which Mizuki NOGUCHI belongs is near the stadium.

sen.j: 合宿などで日本を離れている以外はこの西京極陸上競技場周辺で練習している。
sen.e: Except when she is away from Japan for the training camp and so on, she practices around this Nishikyogoku athletic field.
Except when she is away from Japan at the training camp and so on, she practices here at Nishikyogoku athletic field.
Except when she is away from Japan at the training camp and so on, she practices here at Nishikyogoku athletic field.

sen.j: 1994年6月、当時JFLに在籍していたサンガは川崎製鉄水島サッカー部と当スタジアムで対戦。
sen.e: In June 1994, Sanga, which registered in JFL in those days, faced Kawasaki Steel Mizushima F.C. in this stadium.
In June 1994, Sanga, registered with JFL in those days, faced Kawasaki Steel Mizushima F.C. in this stadium.
In June 1994, Sanga, registered with JFL in those days, faced Kawasaki Steel Mizushima F.C. in this stadium.

sen.j: しかし試合中に竜巻が発生し、この風に煽られてメインスタンドのトタン屋根が剥れる事故があり、メインスタンドの観客をバックスタンドに誘導する処置が取られた。
sen.e: However during the match the accident happened, where tornado formed and the wind broke the zinc roofs off and the audiences in the main stand had to be led to the back stand.
However, during the match an accident happened, a tornado formed and broke the zinc roofs tiles off and the audiences in the main stand had to be led to the rear stand.
However, during the match an accident happened, a tornado formed and broke the zinc roofs tiles off and the audiences in the main stand had to be led to the rear stand.

sen.j: この事故が発生したのはスタジアムが現在の様式に改修される直前のことで、当時サンガの主将を務めていた美濃部直彦は「これで改修を早くしてくれれば」と苦笑混じりにコメントした。
sen.e: This accident happened just before the stadium was renovated into the current form and Naohiko MINOBE, the captain of Sanga in those days, said with a bitter smile, "If only they renovated this."
This accident occurred just before the stadium was renovated into the current form and Naohiko MINOBE, the captain of Sanga in those days, said with a bitter smile, "If only they had renovated this."

This accident occurred just before the stadium was renovated into the current form and Naohiko MINOBE, the captain of Sanga in those days, said with a bitter smile, 'If only they had renovated this sooner.'

tit.cmt: 他ファイルに合わせました。

sen.j: 阪急電鉄阪急京都本線西京極駅下車徒歩5分
sen.e: Get off at Hankyu Kyoto Line Nishikyogoku station and walk five minutes.
Get off at Hankyu Kyoto Line Nishikyogoku station and walk five minutes.
Five minutes walk from Nishikyogoku Station, Hankyu Kyoto Main Line, Hankyu Railway.
sen.cmt: 他ファイルに合わせました。
